title: Is Riot's Game Flawed????

replies.body:
The reason this has happened has nothing to do with Riot's servers/game. It's either your computer/internet that is causing the problems.
(what do i know, i barely know anything about computers, although since you're in NA, the loading screen time shouldnt take very long and certainly shouldnt disconnect you if you have decent internet)

If the problem **is** your internet, and the reason why people disconnect **is because of their** internet, then they should certainly be leavebuster banned because, say that Riot doesn't ban people who take ages to reconnect to the game in the first few minutes. if i was some malicious troll, who just wanted mess with people's time, i could literally disconnect my router/turn off my wifi connections because **riot can't tell if you have had legitimate internet issues or not**


feel free to disagree with me, i'm not so bright in the tech department, and i can certainly be wrong.

Look, I hear ya.. It sucks when your game crashes and you don't know why. It sucks, even more, when the disconnection contributed to conjuring a *Leaverbuster Penalty* on your account. But, it also sucks for all the others players in the matches you've disconnected from. Their game experience is also *negatively impacted* by your disconnection. This is a big reason why disconnections are *all treated equally* by the system and why we cannot remove penalties for any reason.

**Rick Yiordan** provided some great insight here, these types of issues are *very commonly* caused by a poor connection to the servers. I'd strongly advise you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common culprits of these sorts of issues. Please let me know if these steps caused any change.
